ComicInfo.Summary:
Shako [Part 1]: A plane carrying a mysterious capsule crashes in the Arctic Circle; recovery must go through a great white bear - the killer, Shako!
Hell's Angels: When Savage's van breaks down, he stops at a greasy spoon and garage where Volgs show up minutes later. A bike battle ensues.
Harlem Heroes Part 20: Louis Mayer, newly self-propelled, calms the Heroes bickerings, and Giant and King figure out who's been attacking their teammates.
Hollow World Part 9: Dare tries frantically to reach the Galactic Council and warn them of the Two of Verath's thermonium bomb.
Tokyo: Probe teams up with martial arts expert Michael Khan to save Britain's Prime Minister from The Tangs, a fanatical terrorist group.
The Comic Pusher: Judge Dredd breaks up a ring that sells comic books to children for a fortune, and the most valuable is 2000 AD from the 20th century!
